titles.title: Stop the BIS RULE Act
Stop the BIS RULE Act
Stop the Bureaucratic Ineptitude Shuttering Respectable and Upstanding Lawful Exporters Act

A bill to prohibit the use of Federal funds to finalize, implement, or enforce the interim final rule of the Bureau of Industry and Security of the Department of Commerce entitled "Revision of Firearms License Requirements".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.
